head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, NEIL J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, NEIL J.

block.p: MURPHY-Neil J. Age 49 of Cincinnati, Ohio, born in NYC and reared in Bloomfied, New Jersey, died suddenly at home on July 14, 2000. Beloved son of Helen and John Murphy, loving father of Kelley and Meredith and eldest brother of John Keith, Colin, Joan Marie Wynne and Eileen Weber. Devoted husband of Shirley. We will always love you and keep you in our prayers.
